resources.string: Life In UK Flash Card v1.0 \n Tap on the Back button to return.

Features : Counting, Ordering, Pattern, Addition, Subtraction, Multiplication, Division \nAnswers can be Single choise, Multiple choice or Entered through key pad. \nStudents can attain different lwvel of question/answer again and again for practice.
About the App \n We compiled over 1000 questions that may be asked in the maths objective question answer pattern.
